body.name: Shoe Storage,32 Pairs Shoe Rack Organizer for Closet Shoe Cabinet with Door Shoe Shelves for Closet,Entryway,Hallway,Bedroom
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 8 mins
features: 【32 Pairs Shoe Storage】Size: 32"(W) x 12.5"(D) x 48"(H).Our shoe rack provides a large space to store shoes, which can hold 32 pairs of shoes. It can store all kinds of high-heeled shoes, high-top shoes, sports shoes, sports shoes, boots, enough to meet the daily needs of you and your family,make your home neat and uncluttered

【Dustproof & Prevent Pets from Chewing Shoes】All shoes can be enclosed by shoe rack, which can effectively prevent dust and easy to clean. And comes with an easy-to-open transparent door that lets you find your shoes quickly and prevents pets from chewing on your shoes.The perforated door facilitates air circulation and prevents the accumulation of peculiar smells

【Expandable Shoe Rack for Closet】 You can customize the design according to your needs, put the shoe rack in the closet, store shoes, hats, clothes, toys, etc.Keeps your everyday storage handy yet organized

【Suitable for all space】The shoe rack is strong enough, spacious, compact, and can be placed in Closet, living room, doorway, bedroom, office. Equipped with installation instructions and installation tools to help you install quickly and easily.
【Sturdy Structure】The shoe rack is made of metal frame and environmentally friendly, harmless and durable PP material, waterproof and easy to clean. Maximum load capacity of each cube: 11lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, and lovely!
reviews.reviewText: I'm delighted with my shoe rack. Previously, I kept my shoes in their boxes, stacked in the closet. This option is more convenient; my shoes are easily stored, and the pairs I don't wear frequently stay dust-free. I'm about to order a second one for the rest of my shoes and for my husband's. The installation was straightforward, and the rack is both sturdy and visually appealing, making it a great addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Quality Modular Storage!
reviews.reviewText: Simple to put together though it’s somewhat difficult to get the pieces all the way in. I was able to set it up exactly how I needed it to fit my closet and now my closet organization game is so much stronger. Unfortunately my closet is barely too small to use the front covers but when I tried them out they seemed to work really well and had a nice feel when the kinda “snapped” open or closed. I only wish I could give one of my covers to the person that left a review that was missing one! All of the pieces were accounted for in my set.Quality is excellent and I’m not concerned about it falling apart or getting sad and stretched out like some of the fabric shoe shelves. For the price I’m really happy with it!I was able to maximize the number of shoes this held a few ways so that each shelf holds 2-6 pairs of shoes:- For smaller shoes I stack them on top of one another with one facing in and one facing out so the taller parts of the shoes compliment each other and they use the available space efficiently. That allowed me to easily fit 4 pairs of women’s shoes on some. I even double stacked some sandals.- For larger shoes like low top men’s shoes you can alternate upright and upside down next to one another vs on top of one another (the height of the shelves are just a little short for that) but this will allow you to fit two pairs of larger shoes on one shelf- Alternating shoes with the right one facing out and left one facing in will also provide more space per shelf for wider shoes.All in all a great buy, I asked my partner how much he thought I paid for it and he guessed $100 so it looks more expensive than it is! I got a larger one than i thought i need so I’d have flexibility with the parts and it worked perfectly. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: It was fairly easy to assemble. I watched the video they provided. However, the wooden mallet they provided was pretty useless because it came apart after a couple hit. Also the white connector was not the best because it bends when you try to push in the wire. Overall, I like the appearance of it. Very organized and neat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really decent for the price
reviews.reviewText: I am glad that I went with these organizers rather than the individual boxes which may look great but are constricting. I have large feet (W12) and a variety of heels and boots. This allowed me to arrange them all. The boxes/cubes are a good size, but head’s up — a divided box cannot hold heels and an undivided box cannot hold boots. This wasn’t a big deal for me as I was able to arrange them with double boxes for boots and single for heels. Another drawback would be you’ll fit less shoes than advertised: two sets hold roughly 45 pairs of flats, heels, and boots. Set up was really quite easy — did two cases alone without trouble in about 90-120 minutes. Proper sturdy enough to hold heavy boots. Definitely happy with the purchase and am glad it will be fairly simple to add on as I get more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Very nice to organize all my shoe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The clips R a nightmare
reviews.reviewText: Before I purchased this organizer I read some of the reviews. I wanted to make sure I would be able to assemble it. I am an older woman and not very strong. All the reviews said it was simple to build. Well I didn’t find it simple. The clips R a nightmare!!! You need to try to spread them out a little and push hard to get them on. I don’t have the strength to do this part!! Also, the video on how to assemble is next to worthless. It shows nothing up close. That guy just speed demons through the whole video. Hence I rate it a 3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars False advertisement! Not made for high heels.
reviews.reviewText: If you notice, all the reviews with pictures have sneakers, no high-heels. The image used to advertise this product is very misleading with the picture of high heels on the shoe rack. With the divider in the cube there is no way a high heel will fit. You would have to remove the divider, leaving you with enough room to store 16 pairs or lay your heels on their side. Still only storing 16 pairs. After noticing my shoes didn't fit I looked up the standard dimensions for shoe racks. As a general rule, the shoe rack depth should be at least 13 inches so that it can store most types of shoes, including boots and stilettos. I will try to add a video or picture for a visual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my Aunt and she is really satisfied with it
